overview: Karthik Reddy has over 15 years of finance, investment banking, technology and operations experience. Since returning to India in 2006, he has been a media investment banker with SSKI (now part of IDFC), and a part of Brand Capital / Private Treaties at Times Group (where he was a permanent member of the Investment Committee and has sponsored over 50 investments in 3 years) and most importantly, as an angel investor at Mumbai Angels since 2008, where he has made about 10 investments to date.
